CreateGetterDelegate(PropertyInfo)

Creates a compiled delegate that efficiently retrieves the value of the specified property on a given object instance, boxing value types as necessary.

Declaration
public static Func<object, object?> CreateGetterDelegate(PropertyInfo property)
Parameters
Type Name Description
PropertyInfo property

The property for which to generate a getter.
Returns
Type Description
Func<object, object>

A delegate that returns the property's value for a supplied object.
